name: Pop Will Eat Itself
description: '''Pop Will Eat Itself''' are an English [[alternative rock]] band formed in 1986 in [[Stourbridge]] in the [[West Midlands (region)|West Midlands]] of England with members from [[Birmingham]], [[Coventry]] and the [[Black Country]]. Initially known as a [[Grebo (music)|grebo]] act, they changed style to incorporate [[sampling (music)|sample]]-driven [[indie rock|indie]] and [[industrial rock]]. [[Graham Crabb]] describes their sound as "electronic, punk, alternative hip-hop, hybrid music for fucking, fighting & smoking cigars". Their highest-charting single was the 1993 top-ten hit "Get the Girl! Kill the Baddies!". After initially disbanding in 1996, and having a brief reformation in 2005, they issued their first release in more than five years in 2010.
